00033 namespace Hypertable {
00034 
00035 class SockAddrHash {
00036  public:
00037   size_t operator () (struct sockaddr_in addr) const {
00038     return (size_t)(addr.sin_addr.s_addr ^ addr.sin_port);
00039   }
00040 };
00041 struct SockAddrEqual {
00042   bool operator()(struct sockaddr_in addr1, struct sockaddr_in addr2) const {
00043     return (addr1.sin_addr.s_addr == addr2.sin_addr.s_addr) && (addr1.sin_port == addr2.sin_port);
00044   }
00045 };
00046 
00047 template<typename TypeT, typename addr=struct sockaddr_in>
00048 class SockAddrMap : public hash_map<addr, TypeT, SockAddrHash, SockAddrEqual> {
00049 };
00050 
00051 } // namespace Hypertable
